name: MUSCOGEE (CREEK) NATION OF OKLAHOMA
sampleDescriptions: Tribal Sovereignty related to issues resulting from McGirt Supreme Court Decision

Educate members of U.S. House and Senate about effects of recent SCOTUS decision on Indian Country, as a whole, and Muscogee Creek Nation in particular, highlighting Tribal efforts to work with Federa

Ensure that Members of Congress and U.S. Senate are aware of the SCOTUS decision in McGirt v. Oklahoma and of the Muscogee Creek Nation's efforts to work with state and federal entities on law enforce
